body_html:
Sorry for the dumb question, but how can you advice bazel to build TensorFlow with a specific version of Eigen? Can I download Eigen from sources, build Eigen and then point bazel to the local Eigen build?
(I'm having the same issue on a Jetson TX2 / Ubuntu 16.04)

body:
Sorry for the dumb question, but how can you advice bazel to build TensorFlow with a specific version of Eigen? Can I download Eigen from sources, build Eigen and then point bazel to the local Eigen build?
(I'm having the same issue on a Jetson TX2 / Ubuntu 16.04)
